    • Constructor Detail

      • TowerArea

        public TowerArea(java.awt.image.BufferedImage MainTextures,
                 int xBeginMap,
                 int yBeginMap,
                 int xEndMap,
                 int yEndMap,
                 int xBeginSrc,
                 int yBeginSrc,
                 int xEndSrc,
                 int yEndSrc)
        Constructor which is responsible for setting all components.
        Parameters:
        MainTextures - stores Image data buffer(actual Image data buffer)
        xBeginMap- - x point, from which image will be drawn
        yBeginMap- - y point, from which image will be drawn
        xEndMap- - x point, to which image will be drawn
        yEndMap- - y point, to which image will be drawn
        xBeginSrc- - source x point, from which image will be loaded
        yBeginSrc- - source y point, from which image will be loaded
        xEndSrc- - source x point, to which image will be loaded
        yEndSrc- - source y point, to which image will be loaded

    • Method Detail

      • checkClickedArea

        public void checkClickedArea(int xMouse,
                             int yMouse,
                             short whichTower)
        Method which checks if the click action, was on the one of the tower areas. If it was, it execute proper instructions, to draw proper objects, so that player could see that is clicked.
        Parameters:
        xMouse - x cord where click event occurred
        yMouse - y cord where click event occurred
        whichTower - for which tower from listOfTowers it should be checked

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g,
                           int whichTower)
        Method is responsible for drawing all screen content. It's called each time, whenever changes on board are made.
        Parameters:
        g - actual JFrame graphics
        whichTower - for which tower from listOfTowers it should be checked
